title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 point maximum

Translation (1 point): (with) a large crowd/band/group accompanying, following, attending, going along, escorting, joining in, gathering, crowding, thronging, staying (with), being present (with)

[ablatives absolute may be rendered as subordinate clauses; however, the tense, voice, and number of the participle must be rendered accurately]

Grammatical construction (1 point): Ablative absolute
descriptions:
